channel.title: low-code on Anthony Dellavecchia
channel.description: Recent content in low-code on Anthony Dellavecchia

item.title: Do you like scary movies?
item.description: It’s Halloween! Ready to scare your friends and family? Have them text anything to (940) 394-8137. I also wrote a tutorial, so you can build this app yourself. Check it out on Twilio’s Blog.

item.title: Build a Halloween Project with Twilio
item.description: TLDR: This is a tutorial on how to build a Halloween project that you can use to scare friends and family. Overview Do you like scary movies? Based on the cult-class film, Screm (1996), I re-created a famous scene from the movie. Try it out by texting (940) 394-8137. Here’s a gif of using it in action: Tutorial Technologies used in this project are Twilio Studio. It’s pretty simple to create because it’s a low-code tool that uses drag n drop.
